content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.08 > Section 82.08.100 82.08.090 << 82.08.100 >> 82.08.110 PDF RCW 82.08.100 Cash receipts taxpayers — Bad debts. The department of revenue, by general regulation, shall provide that a taxpayer whose regular books of account are kept on a cash receipts basis may file returns based upon his or her cash receipts for each reporting period and pay the tax herein provided upon such basis in lieu of reporting and paying the tax on all sales made during such period. A taxpayer filing returns on a cash receipts basis is not required to pay such tax on debt subject to credit or refund under RCW 82.08.037 .
